mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_lake (observation_id, external_id, updated_at, loaded_at, provider, data, normalized) VALUES (#{observationId}, #{externalId}, #{updatedAt}, #{loadedAt}, #{provider}, #{data}, #{normalized})
UPDATE data_lake SET normalized = 'true' WHERE observation_id = #{observationId}
mapper.select: SELECT observation_id as observationId, external_id as externalId, updated_at as updatedAt, loaded_at as loadedAt, provider, data FROM data_lake WHERE provider = #{provider} ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1
